```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
library(tidyverse)
data <- read_csv("data/vazgen.csv")
main_data <- data |>
  filter(entry_id >= 1331 & entry_id <= 10021) |>
  select(temperature:direction)

```

```{r}
#| echo: false
main_data |> drop_na() |>
  ggplot(aes(x = speed, color = direction, fill = direction)) + 
  geom_histogram(alpha = 0.75, binwidth = 1, linewidth = .1) + 
  labs(title = "Dependancy of speed of wind and direction of wind over time",
       x = "Speed", 
       y = NULL,
       color = "Direction",
       fill = "Direction")
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
library(ggplot2)
theme_set(theme_classic())
main_data |> drop_na() |>
  ggplot(aes(direction)) +
  geom_bar(aes(fill = direction), width = 0.5) + 
  labs(title="Histogram on Categorical Variable", 
       subtitle="Manufacturer across Vehicle Classes") 

```
